title: Ep. 485 - Trump’s Team Goes For The Jugular
description:
On the first full day of President Trump’s impeachment defense, the Trump team flips the script on House Democrats and turns the trial of Donald Trump into a national broadcast of Democrat corruption. We will examine the strategy.

Then, the FBI is reportedly investigating Minnesota Representative Ilhan Omar over claims that she once married her brother, which is definitely gross and possibly illegal. Then, Pete Buttigieg shows he’s not ready for primetime, and Hunter Biden somehow gets into even more trouble.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at dailywire.com/Knowles
